thread.title: Success for Green Light Events at ICE Awards in London
thread.title_full: Success for Green Light Events at ICE Awards in London

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Success for Green Light Events at ICE Awards in London
text:
Success for Green Light Events at ICE Awards in London Success for Green Light Events at ICE Awards in London Details Category: Awards   11:00 Last Thursday night, Green Light Events picked up another prestigious award at the International Corporate Event Awards (ICE-Awards 2015). They won the Best Experiential Marketing Event Award for the #TwitterOnTap event during the largest party of the Dublin Web Summit 2014. 
Green Light Events is a leading technology industry event organiser headquartered in Dublin, and operating globally. Daniel Halpin was thrilled to collect the award on behalf of Green Light Events; “It is a very special day for Green Light Events, to be recognised on the international stage is where we want to be. We won three awards last month in Ireland so this just rounds off an exceptional period for the team. We have such a creative team that we could have entered any number of events for this award” After winning three national awards at the Event Industry Awards in Dublin in May, graduating to an international award was a meaningful occasion for Roisin Callaghan, Co-founder of Green Light Events; “Green Light Events will be celebrating 10 years next year, so to have this esteemed award under our belts is a real accomplishment. We are so proud to be recognised among our International peers and tonight has inspired us to keep pushing the boundaries of our events so that we can make it back next year!”. Related articles
